item.title: The Sage Colleges
item.description: Bachelor’s, Master’s, Doctoral and Online programs. Sage is comprised of Russell Sage College for undergraduate women in Troy, NY; Sage College of Albany, coeducational undergraduate in Albany, NY; and graduate schools of Education, Health Sciences, & Management. Sage offers additional programs through the School of Professional & Continuing Education and Sage Online.
